title: Kapowsin Meats Recalls Pork Product Due To Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued to expand the August 13, 2015 recall to include additional products. Details of this release were also updated to reflect a change in poundage, epidemiological informational and distribution area. WASHINGTON, Aug. 27, 2015 Kapowsin Meats, a Graham, Wash...
